# isCanonicallyLessThan(_:)

**Instance Method**

Whether `self` orders less than `other` under Unicode Canonical Equivalence using normalized code-unit order (in NFC).

## Declaration

```swift
func isCanonicallyLessThan(_ other: UTF8Span) -> Bool
```
